name: Better Off Dead
description:
This game was made for the GameDev.tv jam 2022. The theme is: "Death is only the beginning".

Coded by Trev3lyan. 

Art by Althasor. 

Music by KitKat.

In Better Off Dead, you play as a skeleton brought back to the mortal plane against their will and locked away. Try to escape your corporeal form by completing 6 platformer levels. Each level introduces and challenges you with a new gameplay mechanic, resulting in a short and sweet experience.

AD or arrows to move, SPACE to jump, and P for the Pause menu.

Source code is available for download, including a readme with compilation instructions.

The windows version supports saving of levels completed and settings, the web version does not.
